titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Douglas P. Murphy (1893-1971) was the Assistant Professor of Obstetrics and Gynecology and Research Associate, Gynecean Hospital Institute of Gynecologic Research, University of Pennsylvania.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of papers of Douglas P. Murphy. Materials include: account books from his medical practice, 1946-1958, listing patient visits, brief notes on their conditions, and fees; a scrapbook and loose items related to his military service in World War I, including orders, health records, telegrams, and his A.E.F. identity card. The collection also includes an inscribed copy of Relief of Pain in Childbirth, by W. C. W. Nixon (1951) and a condolence card sent to Mrs. Murphy upon Dr. Murphy's death.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
